actions.recommendation: Left ear - noted to have a small nosule at the back of the left ear canal - please see an ENT to get a review and assessment
eGFR is 75. This can be normal, however please repeat in 3/12 with an additional test to review protein:creatinine ratio in your urine
Hypertension well controlled, Fasting insulin raised& Obese - At risk of developing diabetes;
Vit D suboptimal - Supplement with 1000iu daily and repeat in 3/12
Raised Homocystein and hs-CRP - Improve lifestyle as recommended and supplement with a methylated B vitamen - Metagenics has a good multivitamen with methylated B vit's
Raised fasting insulin levels - Decrease Weight, increase exercise, improve diet. Please repeat levels in 6/12
